about_the_game:
Sword Tomb-Kan Yu is a fast-paced 2D action-platformer packed with roguelike elements, Metroidvania elements and subspace exploration.

As the inheritor of an ancient sect, he follows the wishes of his ancestors and enters the sword tomb alone to fight against the depraved subspace creatures and the cyborg humans compelled by them. As the search continues for the powerful weapons and skills secret left behind by the ancestors, the clues to the destruction of the sect will also become clearer.

Game features:

~The main character can skillfully use multiple flying swords, each of them can be controlled individually. Brisk melee combos, cool sword control stunts, free combination, meet the needs of all kinds of players.


~Dozens of swords, values, appearance and genre skills are specially designed
~Randomly generated maps make each game has a different experience
~Five elements are of the relationships of generation and restriction
